(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ Canon-ieat) (NN food) (NN photography) (NN workshop))
    (VP (VBD attracted)
      (NP
        (NP (CD 50) (NNS participants))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJS largest) (NN turnout))
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (NN date)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(workshop-5, The-1)
amod(workshop-5, Canon-ieat-2)
nn(workshop-5, food-3)
nn(workshop-5, photography-4)
nsubj(attracted-6, workshop-5)
root(ROOT-0, attracted-6)
num(participants-8, 50-7)
dobj(attracted-6, participants-8)
nsubj(turnout-13, which-9)
cop(turnout-13, is-10)
det(turnout-13, the-11)
amod(turnout-13, largest-12)
rcmod(participants-8, turnout-13)
prep(turnout-13, to-14)
pobj(to-14, date-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ reflects)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (VBG increasing) (NN popularity))
              (PP (IN of)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG taking)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNS pictures))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NN food))))
                    (SBAR (IN before)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP we))
                        (VP (VBP eat)
                          (PP (TO to)
                            (NP (NN upload)))
                          (PP (IN onto)
                            (NP (DT the) (NN internet))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
nsubj(reflects-4, it-3)
ccomp(think-2, reflects-4)
det(popularity-7, the-5)
amod(popularity-7, increasing-6)
dobj(reflects-4, popularity-7)
prep(popularity-7, of-8)
pcomp(of-8, taking-9)
dobj(taking-9, pictures-10)
prep(pictures-10, of-11)
pobj(of-11, food-12)
mark(eat-15, before-13)
nsubj(eat-15, we-14)
advcl(taking-9, eat-15)
prep(eat-15, to-16)
pobj(to-16, upload-17)
prep(eat-15, onto-18)
det(internet-20, the-19)
pobj(onto-18, internet-20)

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP We))
      (VP (VBD ran)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (DT a) (NN competition)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB give)
                    (NP (NN everyone))
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN chance))
                      (PP (IN at)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG showing)
                            (PRT (RP off))
                            (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ new))))))))))
            (VP (VBD found)
              (NP (NNS skills)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ happy)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB present)
                (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS winners))))))))
    (. !)))

                      (PRT (RP up))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Carolyn))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN made)
        (NP
          (NP
            (ADJP (RB very) (JJ clever))
            (NN use))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN wire) (NN mesh))))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (JJ shallow) (NN depth))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN field)))))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB create)
              (NP (DT a)
                (ADJP (RB visually) (JJ stunning))
                (NN photo)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN placement))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN bun))
          (PP (IN along)
            (NP (DT the) (CD one) (JJ third) (NN line))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB nicely))
      (VP (VBN balanced)
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (JJ diagonal) (NNS lines))
            (CC and)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ interesting) (NN effect))
              (VP (VBN created)
                (PP (IN by)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN wire) (NN mesh)))))))))
    (. .)))

prep(placement-2, of-3)

pobj(along-6, line-10)

prep(created-22, by-23)
det(mesh-26, the-24)

pobj(by-23, mesh-26)

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB add)
              (VP (VB complement)

                  (NN pastry))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP She))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (VP (VBN applied)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN rule))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NNS thirds))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (PRP$ her) (NN composition))))))))
      (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
      (VP (VBG using)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN edge))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ lazy) (NN susan))))
        (PP (IN as)
          (NP (DT a) (NN diagonal)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB break)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (NP (DT the) (NN background)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(applied-3, She-1)
aux(applied-3, has-2)
root(ROOT-0, applied-3)
det(rule-5, the-4)
dobj(applied-3, rule-5)
prep(rule-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, thirds-7)
prep(thirds-7, in-8)
poss(composition-10, her-9)
pobj(in-8, composition-10)
advmod(well-12, as-11)
cc(applied-3, well-12)
mwe(well-12, as-13)
conj(applied-3, using-14)
det(edge-16, the-15)
dobj(using-14, edge-16)
prep(edge-16, of-17)
det(susan-20, the-18)
amod(susan-20, lazy-19)
pobj(of-17, susan-20)
prep(using-14, as-21)
det(diagonal-23, a-22)
pobj(as-21, diagonal-23)
aux(break-25, to-24)
xcomp(using-14, break-25)
prt(break-25, up-26)
det(background-28, the-27)
dobj(break-25, background-28)

            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN backdrop))

            (VP (VBZ leaves))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB Again))
        (VBG placing)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN subject))
          (PP (VBG according)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (DT the) (NN rule))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNS thirds)))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBG making)
        (NP
          (NP (NN use))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN plate)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB create)
                    (NP (JJ diagonal) (NNS lines))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(placing-2, Again-1)
root(ROOT-0, placing-2)
det(subject-4, the-3)
dobj(placing-2, subject-4)
prep(subject-4, according-5)
predet(rule-8, the-6)
det(rule-8, the-7)
pobj(according-5, rule-8)
prep(rule-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, thirds-10)
cc(placing-2, and-11)
conj(placing-2, making-12)
dobj(making-12, use-13)
prep(use-13, of-14)

pobj(of-14, plate-16)
aux(create-18, to-17)
infmod(plate-16, create-18)
amod(lines-20, diagonal-19)
dobj(create-18, lines-20)
